ComicInfo.Summary:
The team holds off the Malev Robots and forces them to retreat. Rai unites the Future Force to preserve humanity's future.
1st "Rai and the Future Force"
Variant Cover: Gold Logo (see pic below)
Tokoa Konishi 2nd appearance. Tokoa is joined by Magnus and others to fight the Malev forces in Japan.
